definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out

sentences.english: She re married her former husband ten year after their divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她與原來的丈夫離婚十年後又復婚了。

sentences.english: She remarried her former husband ten years after their divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她與前夫離婚十年後又復婚了。

sentences.english: He also will not tell you remarry ?
After the divorce to remarry is in the life most unforgivable stupid mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 離婚後復婚是人生中最不可原諒的愚蠢錯誤。

sentences.english: The vast majority of people who remarry live with their partner first.
sentences.chinese: 大多數人還是會和前任配偶復婚的。

sentences.english: She remarried her former husband ten year after their divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她與原來的丈夫仳離十年後又復婚了。

sentences.english: After Ding Hai went back home, clearly refused to remarry, requires each and all of life.
sentences.chinese: 丁海回家後，明確拒絕復婚，要求各過各的生活。

sentences.english: I do not want to remarry him.
sentences.chinese: 我可不希望到了白髮蒼蒼和他復婚。

definition: Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum
pinyin: yi1 ku1 er4 nao4 san1 shang4 diao4

definition: the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: variant of 慪氣|怄气[ou4 qi4]
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
lit. a good horse doesn't turn around and graze the same patch again (idiom)/fig. once you've moved on, don't go back again (romantic relationship, job etc)/leave the past behind
pinyin: hao3 ma3 bu4 chi1 hui2 tou2 cao3

definition: see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: to patch up one's lie (when inconsistencies appear)/to cover (for sb who has lied)
